function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of proper ventilation and air quality control","Impact":"Increased risk of air pollution and poor indoor air quality","Mitigation":"Implementation of ventilation systems and air quality monitoring","Technologies":"HVAC systems, air purifiers, CO2 sensors","People":"Building occupants, especially those with respiratory issues","Owner":"Architects, building managers, and environmental consultants"},{"Description":"Limited access to natural habitats for animals","Impact":"Negative impact on biodiversity and ecosystem balance","Mitigation":"Integration of green spaces, wildlife habitats, and biodiversity preservation measures in urban design","Technologies":"Green roofs, green walls, wildlife corridors","People":"Local communities, environmental organizations, and urban planners","Owner":"City councils, developers, and urban designers"}]}
